txt.en: The Town of Stoneheight
Gundúl the goblin and his minions have been found
You have defeated Gundúl
Búbhosh-grat has been found
Search through the town for the leaders of the mercenary minions who still remain in Stoneheight.
Búbhosh-grat has fled to his master
The sleeping wolves ahead of you appear to be unaware of your presence
Gundúl is one of the minions of the Gaunt-lord Ivar who remain behind in the village of Stoneheight. Defeat him and put an end to the evil caused by the goblin mercenaries.
You have found Dale Truitt, another servant of Ivar
Search through the remnants of the town for the commanders of the sellsword rebels.
You have defeated Dale Truitt
Búbhosh-grat is yet another of the minions of Ivar at Stoneheight. This uruk-hai must be defeated in order to drive the bandits from the village.
You removed a corruption
The leader of Ivar's sellswords has yet to be seen. This man must be overcome to end the occupation of Stoneheight.
You retreated
Dale Truitt is the last of the sellswords in the service of Ivar. You must remove the mercenary leader to free Stoneheight from the grip of the vandals.
Search for Ivar's minions in Stoneheight
Defeat Gundúl
Search for more of Ivar's minions
Defeat Búbhosh-grat
Discover the location of the sellsword leader
Defeat Dale Truitt
Dale Truitt has been defeated
Defeat Gundúl

The Gaunt-lord Ivar, aided by a band of sellswords, swept through the village of Stoneheight, in search of his missing helm. When his goals were reached, he abandoned the village to the care of the merciless sellswords.
You have defeated Gundúl
